dcterms:creator: Saffet Vatansever
Ahmet Emir Dirik
Nasir Memon
dcterms:description: The Event-Video ENF Dataset (EV-ENFD) records both events and videos in diverse scenes, including static scenes, dynamic scenes caused by object or camera motions, and extreme lighting conditions. It is designed to evaluate the performance of the proposed Event-based ENF extraction method.
dcterms:title: Event-Video ENF Dataset (EV-ENFD)
